scripts.run-server-dev: cd server && npm run startdev && cd ..
scripts.dev-install: npm i && cd server && npm install && cd .. && cd client && npm install
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run install-client && npm run install-server && npm run build
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run server" "npm run start --prefix client"
